pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a port of GraphicsMagick(TM), the "swiss army knife" of image processing. It provides a robust collection of tools and libraries which support reading, writing, and manipulating an image in over 88 major formats including formats like DPX, GIF, JPEG, JPEG-2000, PNG, PDF, SVG and TIFF. The program is the fork of a better-known ImageMagick (5.5.2), which emphasizes end-user and API-stabilities.

use.flag: Compile graphicsmagick with dynamically loadable modules
Enable support for webp image format
